title: I want to experience pixel 4. Please deliver me one pixel 4 and chromecast. I will be very thankful.
content:
Respected Community, 
                                         I want to explore and trying to experience pixel 4 and chrome cast because I have seen some wonderful performance and results of these two products. People of our area are not well aware of these technologies and products. Please deliver me these two products ,I will explore them and will provide knowledge of these products to my people.I hope you will deliver me the products.
                                Thankyou, 
                                                   Your team member,
                                                         Abrar Ahmed .
